text: Howitzers are one of two main types of field artillery, the other being the field gun. Howitzers fire a heavy shell in a high-trajectory from a short barrel. They have a short range, but they are slightly more mobile than similar size field guns. Since World War II howitzers have gained longer barrels and increased range to become gun-howitzers. ==Towed howitzers== Caliber (mm) Weapon name Country of origin Period 70 Type 92 battalion gunBishop, Chris.
